title: NIT AP Notification 2026 - Walk-in interview for Adhoc Faculty Posts
description: The National Institute of Technology Andhra Pradesh (NIT Andhra Pradesh) has officially released the notification to fill the vacancies of 01 Adhoc Faculty Posts. Tech, MBA, and Ph.D. holders can apply for the NIT AP Notification 2026. The interested applicants can attend the walk-in interview. Here we have mentioned the educati...
